text:
The Controller shall prepare a report to the Board of Supervisors by May 15 of each year discussing the numbers and types of contracts that have been approved for the prior year under Charter Section 
10.104(15), how long each affected service has been contracted out, the cost savings as realized for each contract compared to the cost savings as projected at the time of certification, and how many new contracts have been submitted for certification as of the date of preparation of the report. 
(Added by Ord. 105-04, File No. 040594, App. 6/10/2004)

heading.catch_text: CONTROLLER'S ANNUAL REPORT ON CONTRACTING OUT.
